## Introduction [link to data source](https://www.kaggle.com/kinguistics/election-day-tweets/kernels)

On November 2016, the world witness yet another important election from one of the major economic superpowers: the United States. The results left many surprised.

We obtained a dataset from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/kinguistics/election-day-tweets/kernels) that has 34 columns and 397629 rows.
